page.title: 10VILLAGE SURVEY-EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{EMPLOYMENT In my survey I found 52 people worked full time,13 worked part time,21 were self employed and 27 people stayed at home.I also found that more females went for futher education than males. I also found that 19 people work in Alne and local villages,16 worked in York and 12 worked in Easingwold.Other people worked around places all over Yorkshire and Great Britain.I found that one person worked in the North Sea on an oil rig and one person was in the Merchant Navy.
I found that 37 people went to work by car, 8 went to work by bus,5 went to work by bicycle and two went to work in a van and the rest walked.
